Sentencas: For solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) based stationary power generation systems, a compact and efficient design of the hotbox is crucial.
Titulo: Design and analysis of compact hotbox for solid oxide fuel cell based 1 kW-class power generation system

Sentencas: The prime objective of this work is to examine a novel and compact hotbox design that is appropriate for a full-scale 1 kW class SOFC system.
Titulo: Design and analysis of compact hotbox for solid oxide fuel cell based 1 kW-class power generation system

Sentencas: The endothermicity of the processes including steam generation, reforming, and cathode air preheating is maintained by the exothermicity of an integrated fuel processor and heat recovery by heat exchangers.
Titulo: Design and analysis of compact hotbox for solid oxide fuel cell based 1 kW-class power generation system

Sentencas: To achieve higher conversion efficiency, we propose a design that incorporates a fuel processor embedded in the hotbox to combust the off-gases from the fuel cell stack.
Titulo: Design and analysis of compact hotbox for solid oxide fuel cell based 1 kW-class power generation system

Sentencas: The thermal energy from the fuel processor is utilized in the steam generator, reformer, and heat exchangers to balance the heat requirements of the SOFC system.
Titulo: Design and analysis of compact hotbox for solid oxide fuel cell based 1 kW-class power generation system

Sentencas: The numerical simulations are executed in two steps: in the first step, a comprehensive numerical model is implemented on a standalone reformer to determine the heat duty required for the reforming process.
Titulo: Design and analysis of compact hotbox for solid oxide fuel cell based 1 kW-class power generation system

Sentencas: The developed numerical model is further validated with experiments performed on a standalone reformer at different conditions.
Titulo: Design and analysis of compact hotbox for solid oxide fuel cell based 1 kW-class power generation system

Sentencas: The validated model is subsequently employed on the integrated hotbox components (reformer, afterburner) to determine the efficacy and performance of the system.
Titulo: Design and analysis of compact hotbox for solid oxide fuel cell based 1 kW-class power generation system

Sentencas: In the second step, two different heat exchanger designs are numerically examined to determine their effectiveness in terms of waste heat recovery of the stack and the BOP components.
Titulo: Design and analysis of compact hotbox for solid oxide fuel cell based 1 kW-class power generation system

Sentencas: The numerical results show that the in- tegrated reformer gives the same gas composition and methane conversion as that of a standalone reformer but the integrated design is more compact and offers improved efficiency for the SOFC system.
Titulo: Design and analysis of compact hotbox for solid oxide fuel cell based 1 kW-class power generation system
